briefTitle: Selumetinib (AZD6244: ARRY-142886) (Hyd-Sulfate) in Metastatic Uveal Melanoma (SUMIT)
officialTitle: A Randomised, Double-Blind Study to Assess the Efficacy of Selumetinib (AZD6244: ARRY-142886) (Hyd-Sulfate) in Combination With Dacarbazine Compared With Placebo in Combination With Dacarbazine as First Systemic Therapy in Patients With Metastatic Uveal Melanoma (SUMIT)
summary: Selumetinib therapy in patients with metastatic uveal melanoma.

primaryOutcome.measure: Assessment of the Efficacy of Selumetinib in Combination With Dacarbazine Compared With Placebo in Combination With Dacarbazine Measured as Progression Free Survival (PFS) Using BICR According to RECIST 1.1.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Randomization, then every 6 weeks up until progression or death (whichever is sooner) assessed up to 15th May 2015
